scripts.start: printf "\033[s";read -p "Write the output to \`output.log\`? [y/n] -> " ans; printf "\033[u"; printf "\033[2K\r"; if [ "$ans" = "y" ] || [ "$ans" = "Y" ]; then node --trace-warnings index.js > output.log; else node --trace-warnings index.js; fi
scripts.build: dpkg-deb --build ./dpkg-deb/nodejs-playground ./dpkg-deb; npm run update; sudo apt-get install most; npm i node; sudo apt-get upgrade; npm run update
scripts.update: yarn install && sudo apt update && npm i && dpkg --install ./dpkg-deb/nodejs-playground_1.0_all.deb && npm pack --pack-destination packnpm/ && echo Done!
scripts.update2: yarn install | less && sudo apt-get update | less && npm i | less
scripts.apkg: read -p "Yarn, NPM (default), Sudo, or DPKG? [y/n/s/d] " answer && if [ ! "$answer" = "d" ] && [ ! "$answer" = "D" ]; then read -p "Name of package: " package; fi && if [ "$answer" = "y" ] || [ "$answer" = "Y" ]; then yarn add $package; elif [ "$answer" = "s" ] || [ "$answer" = "S" ]; then sudo apt-get install $package; elif [ "$answer" = "d" ] || [ "$answer" = "D" ]; then dpkg-deb --build ./dpkg-deb/nodejs-playground ./dpkg-deb; else npm i $package; fi && echo Done!
scripts.rmpkg: read -p "Yarn, NPM (default), or Sudo? [y/n/s] " answer && read -p "Name of package: " package && if [ "$answer" = "y" ] || [ "$answer" = "Y" ]; then yarn remove $package; elif [ "$answer" = "s" ] || [ "$answer" = "S" ]; then sudo apt remove $package; else npm uninstall $package; fi && echo Done!
scripts.packup: npm pack --pack-destination packnpm/; dpkg-deb --build ./dpkg-deb/nodejs-playground ./dpkg-deb; echo Done!
